name: Kouzuki Momonosuke
text:
[Your Turn] If you have 2 or less Life cards, your Leader gains +1000 power.
[Activate:Main] [Once Per Turn] You may return 2 total of your currently given DON!! cards to your DON!! deck: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters. This Character gains [Rush] and +1000 power during this turn.
(This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

effect.text: If you have 2 or less Life cards, your Leader gains +1000 power.
